src:
“Pronto voy a saber por qué secuestraron a mi esposo”: víctima a exguerrillero
Rosana Rojas lleva 21 años buscando a su esposo y a su hijo, Elí y Edwar Ipuz, secuestrados y desaparecidos por las Farc. Durante el encuentro Hablemos De Verdad, en Neiva, pudo encontrarse con Ronald Rojas, excombatiente de las Farc, quien le dio una luz sobre quiénes se llevaron a sus familiares. Rojas se comprometió a ayudarle en su búsqueda.

07 Nov 2019, 23:08
text:
"Soon I will know why they kidnapped my husband": victim to former guerrilla
Rosana Rojas has been looking for her husband and son, Elí and Edwar Ipuz, for 21 years, kidnapped and disappeared by the Farc. During the meeting, Let's Talk About Truth, in Neiva, he was able to meet Ronald Rojas, ex-combatant of the Farc, who gave him a light on who took his relatives. Rojas promised to help you in your search.

07 Nov 2019, 23:08
